channel.title: Mini Quest Help
channel.description: Hey I need help with the ending of my mini quest, also I need to make it so if you already completed it you cannot do it again. I'd prefer talking over Skype. grant.madison4

item.title: Mini Quest Help
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“Project Amazed Carlos, post:5, topic:510584”]No one here helps, so i will.

[size=29pt]DO NOT CLOSE THE LISTED BELOW[/size]
[size=24pt]1)Open Player.java[/size]
[size=24pt]2) Open playerassistant.java[/size]
[size=24pt]3) Open playersave.java[/size]
[size=24pt]4) Open actionhandler.java[/size]

[ul][li]1) Add [ cookAss = 0, ] in the ints[/li]
[li]2) Addpublic void loadQuests() {
if(c.cookAss == 0) {
sendFrame126("@red@Cook’s Assistant", ####);//Quest number in quest tab
} else if(c.cookAss == 3) {
sendFrame126("@gre@Cook’s Assistant", ####);//same
} else {
sendFrame126("@yel@Cook’s Assistant", ####);//same
}
} [/li]
[li]3) } else if (token.equals(“cookAss”)) {
p.cookAss = Integer.parseInt(token2); [/li]
[li]3) characterfile.write("cookAss = ", 0, 10);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.cookAss), 0, Integer.toString(p.cookAss).length());
characterfile.newLine(); [/li]
[li]4) case 278://NPC ID
if(c.cookAss == 0) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(600, 278);
} else if(c.cookAss == 1) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(616, 278);
} else if(c.cookAss == 2) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(619, 278);
} else if(c.cookAss == 3) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(624, 278);
}
break;[/li][/ul]

[size=18pt]The numbers are listed above [/size]

[size=24pt]THIS IS RIPPED FROM MY SERVER.[/size][/quote]use cod tags pl0zx

Read full topic

item.title: Mini Quest Help
item.dc:creator: @Project_Amazed_Carlo Project Amazed Carlos
item.description:
@Project_Amazed_Carlo wrote:

No one here helps, so i will.

[size=29pt]DO NOT CLOSE THE LISTED BELOW[/size]
[size=24pt]1)Open Player.java[/size]
[size=24pt]2) Open playerassistant.java[/size]
[size=24pt]3) Open playersave.java[/size]
[size=24pt]4) Open actionhandler.java[/size]

[ul][li]1) Add [ cookAss = 0, ] in the ints[/li]
[li]2) Addpublic void loadQuests() {
if(c.cookAss == 0) {
sendFrame126("@red@Cook’s Assistant", ####);//Quest number in quest tab
} else if(c.cookAss == 3) {
sendFrame126("@gre@Cook’s Assistant", ####);//same
} else {
sendFrame126("@yel@Cook’s Assistant", ####);//same
}
} [/li]
[li]3) } else if (token.equals(“cookAss”)) {
p.cookAss = Integer.parseInt(token2); [/li]
[li]3) characterfile.write("cookAss = ", 0, 10);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.cookAss), 0, Integer.toString(p.cookAss).length());
characterfile.newLine(); [/li]
[li]4) case 278://NPC ID
if(c.cookAss == 0) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(600, 278);
} else if(c.cookAss == 1) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(616, 278);
} else if(c.cookAss == 2) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(619, 278);
} else if(c.cookAss == 3) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(624, 278);
}
break;[/li][/ul]

[size=18pt]The numbers are listed above [/size]

[size=24pt]THIS IS RIPPED FROM MY SERVER.[/size]

item.title: Mini Quest Help
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“Sup22211, post:3, topic:510584”]Yes after you make the quest set the boolean to true; then check if it true and if you talking with your mini quest npc it will send you a message that you cant do it anymore,
boolean is the best thing for this case, but i have one problem its not saving the boolean, maybe you have it too.[/quote]I can’t read your answer l0l

Read full topic

item.title: Mini Quest Help
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

Yes after you make the quest set the boolean to true; then check if it true and if you talking with your mini quest npc it will send you a message that you cant do it anymore,
boolean is the best thing for this case, but i have one problem its not saving the boolean, maybe you have it too.

Read full topic
